## Matrix4x4.getLeftPlane() method

Get the left clip plane.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLeftPlane(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The left clip plane

## Remarks

This method assumes that the matrix is an orthogonal projection matrix.
